Package cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models.AbsGameBoard
      • cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameBoard
    public class GameBoard
extends AbsGameBoard
implements IGameBoard
    This class is used to contain our actual GameBoard.
    Invariant:
    3 < NUM_WIN <= 25 AND NUM_WIN <= NUM_ROWS AND NUM_WIN <= NUM_COLUMNS AND 3 <= NUM_ROWS <= 100 AND 3 <= NUM_COLUMNS <= 100 AND [when accessing the board, BoardPositions be w/i bounds] -1 < BoardPosition.getRow() < NUM_ROWS AND -1 < BoardPosition.getColumn() < NUM_COLUMNS
    Correspondence:
    self = board[0...NUM_ROWS-1][0...NUM_COLUMNS-1] AND number_of_rows = NUM_ROWS AND number_of_columns = NUM_COLUMNS AND number_to_win = NUM_WIN

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameBoard​(int rows, int columns, int num_win)
      This constructor creates a new Gameboard with a 2D NUM_ROWSxNUM_COLUMNS array of characters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard​(int rows,
                 int columns,
                 int num_win)
        This constructor creates a new Gameboard with a 2D NUM_ROWSxNUM_COLUMNS array of characters.
        Pre:
        3 <= rows <= 100 AND 3 <= columns <= 100 AND 3 <= num_win <= 25 AND num_win <= columns AND num_win <= rows
        Post:
        board[NUM_ROWS][NUM_COLUMNS] = ' ' AND NUM_ROWS = rows AND NUM_COLUMNS = columns AND NUM_WIN = num_win
        Parameters:
        rows - number of rows in the board
        columns - number of columns in the board
        num_win - how many tokens in a row to win the game

      • checkForDraw

        public boolean checkForDraw()
        This method checks to see if the game has resulted in a tie This method is overrided for increased efficiency with access to board
        Specified by:
        checkForDraw in interface IGameBoard
        Pre:
        checkHorizontalWin(BoardPosition lastPos, char player) == false AND checkVerticalWin (BoardPosition lastPos, char player) == false AND checkDiagonalWin (BoardPosition lastPos, char player) == false
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkForDraw [true iff] board[0...NUM_ROWS][0...NUM_COLUMNS] != ' '
        Returns:
        true if there is no position on board with a single blank space character false if there is 1 or greater blank space characters on the board

      • checkHorizontalWin

        public boolean checkHorizontalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                  char player)
        This method checks to see if the last marker placed resulted in a getNumToWin() in a row horizontally This method is overrided for increased efficiency with access to board
        Specified by:
        checkHorizontalWin in interface IGameBoard
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkHorizontalWin [true iff] board[lastPos.getRow()][0....NUM_COLUMNS] [has the same character in getNumToWin() consecutive positions]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the last placed BoardPosition on the board
        player - the last placed character on the board
        Returns:
        true iff 5 characters in a row on the board in lastPos.getRow() have the same character

      • checkVerticalWin

        public boolean checkVerticalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                char player)
        This method checks to see if the last marker placed results in getNumToWin() in a row vertically This method is overrided for increased efficiency with access to board
        Specified by:
        checkVerticalWin in interface IGameBoard
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkVerticalWin [true iff] board[0...NUM_ROWS][lastPos.getColumn()] [has the same character]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the last placed BoardPosition on the board
        player - the last placed character on the board
        Returns:
        true if every row in the column lastPos.getColumn() is the character player

      • checkDiagonalWin

        public boolean checkDiagonalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                char player)
        This method checks to see if the last marker placed results in getNumToWin() in a row diagonally This method is overrided for increased efficiency with access to board
        Specified by:
        checkDiagonalWin in interface IGameBoard
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkDiagonalWin [true iff getNumToWin() diagonal places on the board contain the same character]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the last placed BoardPosition on the board
        player - the last placed character on the board
        Returns:
        true if 5 characters on board in a row contain player is in a row diagonally
